title: SSI
description: Site specific information for gazetteer locations

uprn.title: UPRN
uprn.description: UPRN of the property where the alarm is located

dataSource.title: Data Source
dataSource.description: Where this data has come from - Ordnance Survey, legacy, etc

securityLevel.title: Security Level
securityLevel.description: Security level to reflect sensitivity of SSI information

securityLevelValidityDate.title: Security Level Validity Date
securityLevelValidityDate.description: Date that the security level is valid until

reviewDate.title: Review Date
reviewDate.description: Date for SSI information to be reviewed by
